item.title: Need hoster
item.dc:creator: @tisko1 tisko1
item.description:
@tisko1 wrote:

Well, all i know is from the looks of it you wouldn’t look like you would have a good server. I get this assumption mainly because you cannot spell until right, have 8 rep, and you are watched. Not to mention you dont have much info such as: how to play/forum link. Media(info can replace this as long as it is descriptive.) Anyway, sorry if it seemed like i was being a douche or something like that. Just listing out some facts, anyway gl finding a host. P.S I wouldn’t give them co-owner unless you got to know them pretty well, atleast thats what i would do. Only because they could fuck the server while you are offline.

EDIT: I’m not sure but i don’t think you can request a host here. Please correct me if i’m wrong because i’m not very active…

Read full topic
